subject: feat: add SVG app icon with rose gold chat bubble design
body:
- Create icon.svg with chat bubble + tone waves design
- Uses rose gold gradient (#E5D4B8 to #A8865F) on dark background
- Shadow effect for depth (semi-transparent bubble behind)
- Subtle glow filter for premium feel
- Update manifest.json to include SVG as primary icon
- Add SVG favicon link to index.html
- Add icon.svg to service worker precache

https://claude.ai/code/session_017CVEz1rhrWxzjCYEaz2mZr
title: add SVG app icon with rose gold chat bubble design
